Summary: Bright green iluminated...100 feet above trees 1/2 mile away...falling to ground.
divs: sighting details1:30 am. jan\14\2010.opened door ,noticed diamond shape brightly lit green object falling towards earth..was 1\2 mile away and is was 100 feet above trees ..until it fell below trees and lost sight of it
